quote_last: o'clock, Daisy Robinson, about to reach her own apartment door, paused to look and to listen. Something was out of order. Tess Rogan's door was standing wide open and, from within, Daisy could hear something being broken.
title: The Seventeen Widows of Sans Souci
author: Charlotte Armstrong

quote_last: local time when the Red October broke the surface of the Atlantic Ocean for the first time, forty-seven miles southeast of Norfolk. There was no other ship in sight.
title: The Hunt for Red October
author: Tom Clancy
